programme.desc: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in - When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. // The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1005
programme.desc: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow - The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep220
programme.desc: The Freeze Out / The Crystal Coral Conundrum - Instead of confronting his pals about a problem, Chucks decides to find a new friend group. // When the Crystal Coral Tree goes missing, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson are on the case.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Deep Goo Sea - William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Birth Of Barbapapa / The Reveal - Young Franois witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Friendaversary Adventure / Swiper's Birthday Surprise - Boots and Dora journey to Banana Hill to bring Isa a Friendiversary gift - a flowerpot that Boots painted himself! // Dora and friends throw Swiper a surprise birthday party. On the way to the party, Swiper attempts to swipe his own surprise present.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Deep Sea Grand Prix - For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Penguin Panic / Cave Conundrum - When an iceberg boat turns up on the shore, the city and forest are suddenly overrun with problematic penguins! // When the Deer Squad get separated in the crystal caves, they must think and act like each other to get out safely.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1009
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Gold Finding Machine / Pups Help Mayor Humdinger Out of a Jam - The Paw Patrol springs into action when a digging machine goes out-of-control and takes Uncle Otis on a wild ride. // Digi and Tal, try to help Mayor Humdinger but leave the Mayor covered in jam, the Pups must rescue him from hungry animals.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep326
programme.desc: Pups Save Floating Friends - The aliens spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Robot Power - When Crusher unleashes three of his most destructive creations on Axle City, there's only one hero strong enough to save the day: Robot Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers / Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat. // Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1002
programme.desc: Pups Save a High-Flying Hen / Pups Save a Sloth - After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue her. // Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey. He races the Paw Patrol to find it when it goes missing to cover up his blunder.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut - Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's day off but the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia - Glitch transform's Sydney's iconic Opera House into an opera boat for a race around the Australian city's harbour.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Statue of Liberty, USA - Grandmaster Glitch makes the Statue of Liberty fall right into the path of a passing ferry.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Loud and Quiet - Kit and Pup are investigating the world of Opposites; today it's Loud and Quiet.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Pizza - Dee encourages a friend to say 'pizza' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of pizza - a round pizza, a tomato pizza, a party pizza and a cheesy pizza!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep84
programme.desc: Musical Statues - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po enjoy a game of musical statues. It takes the Teletubbies a few turns to work out what to do when the music stops; they must stand very still.

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Radio Wol - The Iron Chicken's radio breaks down, so she and the Wols create their own radio station.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Zip's Magnificent Memory Book - The friends go to the waterfall to see a rainbow.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Puppy Snuggle Time - A puppy sleepover in Doug-Po's room proves problematic when the puppies keep falling out of bed.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lolly's Keys - Messy monster is having breakfast and sees little objects on the fridge. Why don't they fall off? He goes to OKIDO to find out!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Ice Ice Messy - Messy's new friend is in a spot of hot bother! They go on an icy adventure to the South Pole, the desert and the mountains to help.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep55
programme.desc: Monty Repeats Himself - A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep22
programme.desc: It's time to ride a bike - JoJo wishes Gran Gran could join her on a bike ride in the park, so Gran Gran decides to fix her old bicycle. After a good clean and fix-up, she's ready to ride!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep23
programme.desc: It's time for autumn leaves - JoJo needs to find different-coloured leaves to complete her nature tick-book, but can't find a green one. Luckily, Gran Gran has a plan that involves a special leaf rubbing!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Dewy Morning - Sarah and Duck visit the art shop, but arrive early and must entertain themselves.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Sticker Swap - Sarah is keen to complete her sticker album, so sets off to see ifher friendscan help.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep21
programme.desc: All Tracks Lead to Rome - Thomas is working on the Italian Railway, keen to prove to his new friend Gina that he is an expert in all things Italian.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Spy Game - When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Yoga Ball - Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep22
programme.desc: The Pool - Packing for the pool, Bluey and Dad tease Mum about being so fussy with what to take. But when they arrive underprepared, they realise a little planning goes a long way.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Sahara Desert, Africa - Glitch makes a sandcastle around an oasis in the Sahara. Can the Go Jetters save the day?

programme.desc: Niagara Falls, Canada and USA - Glitch blocks Niagara Falls to give GrimHQ a mud bath, so the Go Jetters set out to fix the problem.

programme.desc: ROUNDTABLE: 50 Years of Malaysia-China Friendship" is a television special celebrating half a century of diplomatic and economic ties between Malaysia and China. Hosted by Jessy Chahal of BERNAMA TV and Tang Bo of CGTN, the program features insights from four key figures from both countries. They explore the multifaceted relationship, examining past collaborations, current dynamics, and future prospects in trade and cultural exchanges.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 302: Makhachev vs. Poirier
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the most dominant champions in the UFC returns to defend his crown at the Rock on June 2, as UFC lightweight champion Islam Makhachev puts his 13-fight winning streak on the line against Louisiana superstar Dustin The Diamond Poirier in the main event of UFC 302 at the Prudential Center in Newark. New Jersey. Fresh from a stirring knockout of Benoit Saint Denis, Poirier is in prime form heading into his title fight with Makhachev, who owns recent wins over Alexander Volkanovski and Charles Oliveira. Plus, former middleweight champion Sean Strickland begins his road back to the top in a five-round co-feature against Brazilian banger Paulo Costa that will put the winner on the fast track to a crack at the 185-pound title

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep901UFC256FigueiredovsMoreno1
programme.desc: An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION
programme.desc: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION - Goals, saves and other superhuman feats that have graced the Bundesliga. Since inception in 1963, who stands atop the Bundesliga charts?

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC289NunesvsAldana
programme.desc: Mexico's Irene Aldana challenges Brazils Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289. Plus, its a clash at lightweight as former champ Charles Oliveira battles Beneil Dariush. See the entire main card, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep909UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: Welterweight champion Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman returns to the Octagon to defend his title for the 6th time against familiar foe, Leon Rocky Edwards. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 278.

programme.title: MotoGP - Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP - Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights - Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to Frances significant racing heritage.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Pink Spiders vs Hillstate (3rd game)
programme.desc: Pink Spiders vs Hillstate (3rd game) - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION
programme.desc: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION - Goals, saves and other superhuman feats that have graced the Bundesliga. Since inception in 1963, who stands atop the Bundesliga charts?

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Barboza vs. Murphy
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten British sensation Lerone Murphy has won five in a row in the UFC Octagon, but on Saturday, May 18, Manchesters Miracle man will face his toughest test to date in the form of veteran featherweight contender Edson Barboza, as the two collide in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. After a 2023 campaign in which he scored performance bonus-winning victories over Billy Quarantillo and Sodiq Yusuff, Brazils Barboza now has his sights on Murphy, who upped his record to 13-0-1 with two victories of his own last year.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep603LockedInWMMADecadeUnbreakableZhangWeiliFighterFocusPolyanaVianaDayOneMayceeBarber
programme.desc: We celebrate a decade of Women in the UFC by looking back at the fighters and moments that make up this decorated history. We dive into the relationship between Zhang Weili and Cai Xuejun and discover how they built Weilis impressive career, crowning her the first-ever Chinese champion in UFC history. programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant champions in the UFC returns to defend his crown at the Rock on June 2, as UFC lightweight champion Islam Makhachev puts his 13-fight winning streak on the line against Louisiana superstar Dustin The Diamond Poirier in the main event of UFC 302 at the Prudential Center in Newark. New Jersey. Fresh from a stirring knockout of Benoit Saint Denis, Poirier is in prime form heading into his title fight with Makhachev, who owns recent wins over Alexander Volkanovski and Charles Oliveira. Plus, former middleweight champion Sean Strickland begins his road back to the top in a five-round co-feature against Brazilian banger Paulo Costa that will put the winner on the fast track to a crack at the 185-pound title

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Barboza vs. Murphy
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten British sensation Lerone Murphy has won five in a row in the UFC Octagon, but on Saturday, May 18, Manchesters Miracle man will face his toughest test to date in the form of veteran featherweight contender Edson Barboza, as the two collide in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. After a 2023 campaign in which he scored performance bonus-winning victories over Billy Quarantillo and Sodiq Yusuff, Brazils Barboza now has his sights on Murphy, who upped his record to 13-0-1 with two victories of his own last year.

programme.title: MotoGP - Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP - Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights - Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to Frances significant racing heritage.
